attributes.action: Don't Blame Blackpool Teaching Hospitals NHS Foundation Trust
attributes.additional_details:
I am astonished at the comments of Mr Cameron. Targeting trusts with high mortality rates. I demand answers to the non regionalised bullying to regions that have the highest elderly population in the UK. You blame poor care and lack poor nursing standard....I blame you and the overlooked NHS staff who come to work whilst always being devalued.
Your cuts, your slating's to all NHS employees is unacceptable and I DEMAND AN APPOLOGY to all NHS staff you ignore and underpay and demand more from!!!!!!!
